snippet.title: DragonBox Elements - Official Trailer
snippet.description:
DragonBox Elements - The game that secretly teaches Geometry

The game gives players an introduction to Euclid's Elements, one of the most important textbooks ever written. Learn the essential definitions, propositions, axioms and theorems of Euclid and use them to solve fun puzzles. 

Find out more on:
http://www.wewanttoknow.com/elements 

Or download directly from your prefered app store:

Apple App Store: https://itunes.apple.com/app/id875267105

Google Play Store: https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.wewanttoknow.Euclid

Amazon Appstore: http://www.amazon.com/gp/mas/dl/android?p=com.wewanttoknow.Euclid
